node.statement: PARTIAL PROOF: k3=0 case proved analytically via Cauchy-Schwarz (2-step argument: Key Lemma sA+tB<=(s+t)C + CS inequality). Full case verified numerically (0 violations in 447K trials). Partial fraction decomposition of -R4 verified. Full analytical proof OPEN. See examples7/R4_proof_result.md.
